cab.content: 3SEC RET.BATTLE SITUATION * EVENING : 50th AUGUST?- 1918.1, WESTERN FRONT.. British Front.On the- 2nd. Army Front our troops have pushed forward east of BAILEEUL but tho enemy hold the MONT-DE-LILLE 1.000 yards south-east of BAILLEUL. We hold MOOTS BOON 3,000 yards south-west of BAILLEUL.On the 1st and 3rd Army Fronts south of the SCARPE the enemy have counter-attacked and have captured ECOUST which we had taken this morning. He also re-captured half of HENDECOtBT. We hold VRAUCOURT and VAULX-VRAUCOURT but not the VRAUCOURT sugar factory which is north-west of VRAUCOURT.We took 500 prisoners in the attack north of REMY this morning. French Front.North of SOISSONS the French have gained Point 159 on the high ground south of LEURY.2 . ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.There is no change in the situation*-General Staff,War Office, S.W.1.30th August, 1918. Issued at 6.55 p.m.Many fires were seen burning in the LYS salient duringlast night.
